<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add PKM Items</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/pkm"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Add PKM (Public Key Management) items associated with the user's account.
